long_description: A stylish ride with a sloping top tube that makes it easy to step on and off, the Raleigh Detour 4.5 Step-Through Women's Bike offers comfort on everyday rides. Aluminum frame is sturdy and designed for a blend of comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position for great visibility. Shimano crankset and derailleurs provide easy pedaling and shifting through all 24 speeds; it's geared for hills as well as flat roads. Shimano EF-51 trigger shifters are intuitively easy to use and deliver smooth shifting. Tektro V-brakes provide smooth, responsive deceleration for easy speed management. Wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets. Suspension seatpost offers bump-smoothing comfort; angle-adjustable stem lets you fine-tune the handlebar to enhance the fit. Convenient platform pedals accept most casual shoes. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). Specs on the Raleigh Detour 4.5 Step-Through women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: A stylish ride with a sloping top tube that makes it easy to step on and off, the Raleigh Detour 4.5 Step-Through Women's Bike offers comfort on everyday rides.
